title: PUBG
description: PUBG Mobile is a fast-paced battle royale game where players fight for survival, strategy, and victory on dynamic maps.

title: Valorant
description: A 5v5 character-based tactical shooter where precise gunplay meets unique agent abilities. Creativity is your greatest weapon.

title: Fortnite
description: A massive online multiplayer game featuring Battle Royale, alongside creative modes where you can build your own islands and games.

title: Apex Legends
description: A free-to-play hero shooter where legendary characters with powerful abilities team up to battle for fame and fortune on the fringes of the Frontier.

title: DOOM Eternal
description: The Doom Slayer returns to save humanity from a demonic invasion on Earth in this fast-paced, visceral first-person shooter.

title: Resident Evil Village
description: Set a few years after Biohazard, Ethan Winters finds himself in a mysterious, snow-covered village searching for his kidnapped daughter.

title: Minecraft
description: A sandbox game where players can build, mine, and explore in a blocky, procedurally-generated 3D world with infinite terrain.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: An open-world game set in the fictional state of San Andreas. Follow three criminals and their efforts to commit heists while under pressure.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: America, 1899. Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang are outlaws on the run. A story of loyalty, betrayal, and the end of the cowboy era.

title: Stardew Valley
description: You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Armed with hand-me-down tools, you set out to begin your new life.

title: Ghost of Tsushima
description: In war-torn 13th-century feudal Japan, you are Jin Sakai, a samurai warrior. Fight to free Tsushima from the Mongol invasion.

title: Death Stranding
description: Sam Porter Bridges must brave a world utterly transformed by the Death Stranding to reconnect the shattered continent.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: Play as Geralt of Rivia, a monster slayer for hire, as he searches for his adopted daughter in a war-torn and monster-infested continent.

title: Genshin Impact
description: Travel across Teyvat, a vast world teeming with life and flowing with elemental energy. An anime-style, open-world gacha-based adventure.

title: Elden Ring
description: A sprawling fantasy-action RPG set in the Lands Between, created by FromSoftware and George R. R. Martin. Rise, Tarnished.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: An open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour and body modification. Play as V.

title: Baldur's Gate 3
description: Gather your party and return to the Forgotten Realms in a tale of fellowship and betrayal, based on the Dungeons & Dragons ruleset.

title: Disco Elysium - The Final Cut
description: A groundbreaking role-playing game. You're a detective with a unique skill system at your disposal and a whole city to carve your path across.

title: League of Legends
description: A team-based strategy game where two teams of five powerful champions face off to destroy the other's base in a fast-paced, competitive setting.

title: Among Us
description: A game of teamwork and betrayal for 4-15 players. Crewmates work together to complete tasks, but one or more Impostors are bent on sabotage.

title: Hades
description: Defy the god of death as you hack and slash your way out of the Underworld in this rogue-like dungeon crawler from the creators of Bastion and Transistor.

title: Control
description: After a secret agency in New York is invaded by an otherworldly threat, you become the new Director struggling to regain Control.

title: It Takes Two
description: Embark on the crazier journey of your life in It Takes Two, a genre-bending platform adventure created purely for co-op.

title: Mass Effect Legendary Edition
description: Relive the legend of Commander Shepard in the highly acclaimed Mass Effect trilogy, remastered and optimized for 4K.

title: God of War (2018)
description: Kratos and Atreus embark on a perilous journey into the Norse wilds as they struggle to survive and come to terms with Kratos' bloody past.

title: Horizon Zero Dawn
description: Explore a vibrant world inhabited by colossal machines. Aloy, an outcast, embarks on a journey to uncover the mysteries of her past and her destiny.

title: Hollow Knight
description: Explore a vast, interconnected world, battle fierce creatures and befriended bizarre bugs, and uncover ancient mysteries in the kingdom of Hallownest.

title: Returnal
description: Break the cycle of chaos on an ever-changing alien world in this third-person roguelike shooter. Crash-land and explore ancient civilizations.

title: Inside
description: Hunted and alone, a boy finds himself drawn into the center of a dark project. A dark, narrative-driven platformer from the creators of Limbo.

title: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
description: Explore Sengoku Japan as the 'one-armed wolf', a disgraced and disfigured warrior rescued from the brink of death. Restore your honor.
